title: Under the New Green Leaves
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>What a beautiful day, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah. The breeze also feels nice, it’s such a great season.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Look, Riko-chan. The greenery on the mountains is getting so thick.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re right. I never knew there were these many different types of greens before coming to Uchiura. There are pale greens, bright greens, and deep dark greens.... They’re all so beautiful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe. Ruby also loves the green season, so hearing you say you like it makes me happy too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. Shall we watch some more before everyone else arrives?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Sure. Everyone said they’ll be late today, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s so beautiful....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Fwaaah.... Sorry, Ruby is getting kind of sleepy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Actually, me too. Hey, how about we take a little nap?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then, just a little.... Good night.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
